response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to you. After careful consideration and evaluation, I propose to offer this product to you at a special price of $950,000. This is a fantastic deal considering the product's worth to you is $1,200,000. I believe this price reflects the value while allowing us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions regarding the product or the terms. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
